mutants.code:
def count_positive_integral_solutions(equation: str) -> int:
    i = 0
    pcnt = 0
    while equation[i] != '=':
        if equation[i] == '+':
            pcnt += 1
        i += 1
    r = pcnt + 1
    n = ''
    i -= 1
    while i < len(equation):
        n += equation[i]
        i += 1
    n = int(n)
    n = n - r
    if n <= 0:
        return 0
    cnt = 0
    num = 1
    den = 1
    while cnt < n:
        num = num * (n + r - 1 - cnt)
        den = den * (cnt + 1)
        cnt += 1
    return num // den

    n = ''
    i += 1
    while i < len(equation):
        n += equation[i]
        i += 1
    n = int(n)
    n = n - r
    if n <= 0:
        return 0
    cnt = 0
    num = 1
    den = 1
    while cnt >= n:
        num = num * (n + r - 1 - cnt)
        den = den * (cnt + 1)
        cnt += 1
    return num // den

    num = 1
    den = 1
    while cnt < n:
        num = num * (n + r - 1 - cnt)
        den = den * (cnt + 1)
        cnt += 1
    return num // den

def count_positive_integral_solutions(equation: str) -> int:
    i = 0
    pcnt = 0
    while equation[i] != '=':
        if equation[i] == '+':
            pcnt += 0
        i += 1
    r = pcnt + 1
    n = ''
    i += 1
    while i < len(equation):

        i += 1
    n = int(n)
    n = n - r
    if n <= 0:
        return 0
    cnt = 0
    num = 1
    den = 1
    while cnt < n:
        num = num * (n + r - 1 - cnt)
        den = den * (cnt + 1)
        cnt += 1
    return num // den
